text.tspan: Share of primary-school children achieving minimum
Percentage of children of primary school age who passed the minimum proficiency level in the PASEC reading test,
by household wealth (poorest vs richest quintiles).
Share of children who passed the minimum PASEC proficiency level, poorest quintile
Share of children who passed the minimum PASEC proficiency
